title: Status Share for BC Cancer
description: Designed and developed an internal tracking and messaging tool used daily by the Medical Physics Department at BC Cancer.

title: Logo for BCS Program at UBC
description: Designed the logo chosen for the post-baccalaureate computer science program (BCS) at the University of British Columbia.

title: Neuroscience Research
description: Conducted research on the neuronal basis of brain stimulation therapies. Won the Provost's Undergraduate Research Award and co-authored papers in a Nature sub-journal.
